com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry

Class Matrix4f

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry.Matrix4f

  • public class Matrix4f
extends Object
    A simple Matrix4f class to use in shaders and simple transformations like scaling, translating and rotating.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix4f()
      Constructs a new Matrix4f initialized to identity

      • initOrtho

        public Matrix4f initOrtho(float left,
                          float right,
                          float bottom,
                          float top,
                          float zNear,
                          float zFar)
        Initializes this matrix into a transformation matrix, which transforms the vertices into orthographic projection.
        Parameters:
        left - The left most coordinate of the Display
        right - The right most coordinate of the Display
        bottom - The bottom most coordinate of the Display
        top - The top most coordinate of the Display
        zNear - The near depth clipping plane
        zFar - The far depth clipping plane
        Returns:
        This matrix for chaining operations

        Parameters:

        y - The column of the matrix
        Returns:
